titleStmt.title: A mery p[ro]nosticacion for the yere of Chrystes incarnacyon a thousande fyue hundreth fortye [and] foure this to pronostycate I may be bolde that wha[n] the newe yere is come gone is ye olde.

notesStmt.note: Identified as STC 20422 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of a photostat of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
